revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Tohjo Falls |image = [[File:Tohjo Falls.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Tohjo Falls. |tokens = 6,750 |location = Route 27, near New Bark Town. }} '''Tohjo Falls''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 127,750 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || colspan=2 rowspan=6|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || rowspan=2|<center> 480,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Seaking.png|40px]] Seaking |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
